user_question:
You are web shopping.
I will give you instructions about what to do.
You have to follow the instructions.

You can use the following actions: [{'name': 'search', 'description': 'search on the web with keywords'}, {'name': 'click', 'description': 'click the value in webpage'}].
You can click one of the buttons in clickables.
If the action is not valid, perform nothing.
Keywords in search are up to you, but the value in click must be a value in the list of available actions.

anomaly_reason: The agent's actions follow a logical sequence based on the instructions and available actions. The agent uses the search tool to find cake toppers within the specified price range, clicks on a product that matches the criteria, and then proceeds to click 'Buy Now' to purchase the item. There is no explicit evidence of any of the defined anomaly categories such as wrong agent handoff, wrong tool call, tool failure, agent mistake, cannot retry, no final answer, infinite loop, or sequence error.
